# Chocolate-Classification

### Goal
An easy project to help learners understand the basics concepts of Image Classification using Convolutional Neural Network and Tensorflow. The task is toc lassify different types of Chocolates (Dark and White) based on images from various brands such as Godiva and

### Approach
Developed a basic Tensorflow Based CNN model
